EmailTemplate.description: New Email Template setup in June 2012
EmailTemplate.name: 13/12/12 BSKL Basketball Skills Club
EmailTemplate.subject: BSKL Basketball Skills Club
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Term 2 sees the return of the BSKL Basketball Skills Club coached by Daniel Dean and Grace McElwaine, two of our Teaching Assistants.
We are very pleased to announce that this term it will also be open to those in Year 4.
Club Flyer
Details of the club are provided in the leaflet below, including how to register.
Basket Ball Skills Club Spring Term
If you have any questions regarding the course please contact:
Daniel Dean at daniel.dean@britishschool.edu.my or
Grace McElwaine: grace.mcelwaine@britishschool.edu.my
Kindly be advised that there is no school bus service available for this club.
Regards, Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
